item.description:
Due to popular demand -- and because we do this often and have enjoyed it thoroughly, once again we're meeting at the Bean for live music.'

Sessions that evening include:
Songwriter Sessions - Monthly acoustic songwriters in the round hosted by Lisa Martin - Songwriters will perform a song written for this months show. Joanne Lurgio- guest host, Patti DeRosa & Jim Gallant
rock, folk, acoustic

They serve excellent food and drink and it's a pleasant, rural chic place.

We'll meet in the main room -- it's a small place, would be hard to miss people. There's a 5$ donation for the music.

The Vanilla Bean Cafe is at 450 Deerfield Rd, Pomfret CT

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Songwriter Sessions @ The Vanilla Bean Cafe
